Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.test

Entry: ChoiceOfDatishThings
Value:        date or dateTime or StringishDateTime

Entry: ThingWithChoiceField
Property: ChoiceOfDatishThings 1..1

Entry: PrimitiveTypeConstraintOnField
Parent:     ThingWithChoiceField
            ChoiceOfDatishThings only dateTime

Entry: NonPrimitiveTypeConstraintOnField
Parent:     ThingWithChoiceField
            ChoiceOfDatishThings only StringishDateTime

Element:      StringishDateTime
Value:        string
